sub_title: Signage Project Manager | Key Account Manager | Graphic Signage Designer
summary: I am a professional in the signage manufacturing and design industry with a passion for creativity and function. My infectious positive attitude and excellent time management skills makes me the best fit for an excellent Key Account Manager and Project Manager in the marketing and advertising sector.

company.name: HG Reclame | Creatief werk van formaat

profile_positions.company: HG Reclame | Creatief werk van formaat
profile_positions.description:
- My roles and responsibilities include advanced and operational management in the  signage industry sector. 
- I take inquiries and requests from clients and address their needs based on the marketing and advertising market.
- Stay on top of our client accounts, making sure they’re receiving services that  are within their budget and meeting their needs.
- I ensure I retain top customers and nurture these key relationships over time.
- I meet regularly with members of my team to discuss progress and find new ways to improve productivity and delivery.
- Ensure open communication lines and report to higher management within the organization.
- Occasionally I do site visits for the purpose of design proposals. 
- I work on JamesPro as a Project Management Software Package.
profile_positions.title: Signage Project Manager & Key Account Manager

profile_positions.location: City of Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa
profile_positions.description:
- Appointed manager of the Design Team and assisted in the design aspect. 
- Responsible for the ordering of materials for print and production materials.
- Worked on CNC Flat bed Routers, Channel Letter machines and HP Flat bed UV printers. 
- I set up printers and ensured smooth processing of the printing material for the purpose of signage production. 
- Set up tasks and duties for vinyl application and occasionally assist with vinyl application. 
- Managed client accounts by liaising with them and addressing their inquiries and requests.
- Responsible for retaining of our long standing accounts. 
- Responsible for costings, setting budgets and openly communicating financial targets with higher management within the organization. 
- Ensured municipal applications and approvals for signage installation.  
- Ensured the company was in good standing with the Health and Safety 
department.
- Responsible for staff development and ensured Health and Safety regulations were met. 
- Appointed assistant manager to the Factory Team and ensuring open communication lines between design and factory colleague. 
- Responsible for the ordering and delivery of manufacturing materials. 
- Oversaw planning and instillation of manufactured signage and responsible for quality control. 
- Delegated tasks and responsibilities to rigging teams. 
- I met regularly with Factory Manager and Director to discuss progress and find new ways to improve productivity and delivery.
profile_positions.title: Signage Project Manger & Key Account Manager

profile_positions.location: City of Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa
profile_positions.description:
- Set up vinyl cut files and responsible for vinyl cutting. 
- Responsible for vinyl application to boards, vehicles and light aircraft.  
- Involved in the manufacturing process and instillation of manufactured signage.
profile_positions.title: Applicator & Signage Installer & Graphic Designer
